Serialized Form

  • Package battleship

    • Class battleship.GameBoard extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • player1Board

          Grid player1Board
          The board where the current players ships are displayed.

        • player2Board

          Grid player2Board
          The board where the second players ships are. The current player clicks on buttons on this board to fire.

        • player1Values

          int[][] player1Values
          The array of ints that store the locations of each point that contains player 1's ships.

        • player2Values

          int[][] player2Values
          The array of ints that store the locations of each point that contains player 2's ships.

        • player1Ships

          Ship[] player1Ships
          Set ship pictures on gameboard.

        • player2Ships

          Ship[] player2Ships
          set ship pictures on gameboard.

        • player1Turn

          boolean player1Turn
          Boolean to determine if it is player 1's turn. Starts true so player1 has first move.

        • player2Turn

          boolean player2Turn
          Boolean to determine if it is player 2's turn. Starts false so player2 has second move.

        • cpuShots

          java.util.ArrayList<E> cpuShots
          ArrayList of points to hold where the cpu has already shot.

        • cpuAircraftCarrierHits

          int cpuAircraftCarrierHits
          Current number of hits that the cpu has hit player 1's aircraft carrier.

        • cpuBattleShipHits

          int cpuBattleShipHits
          Current number of hits that the cpu has hit player 1's battleship.

        • cpuSubmarineHits

          int cpuSubmarineHits
          Current number of hits that the cpu has hit player 1's submarine.

        • cpuCruiserHits

          int cpuCruiserHits
          Current number of hits that the cpu has hit player 1's cruiser.

        • cpuPatrolBoatHits

          int cpuPatrolBoatHits
          Current number of hits that the cpu has hit player 1's patrol boat.

        • aircraftCarrierHits

          int aircraftCarrierHits
          Current number of hits that player 1 has hit the cpu's aircraft carrier.

        • battleShipHits

          int battleShipHits
          Current number of hits that player 1 has hit the cpu's battle ship.

        • submarineHits

          int submarineHits
          Current number of hits that player 1 has hit the cpu's submarine.

        • cruiserHits

          int cruiserHits
          Current number of hits that player 1 has hit the cpu's cruiser.

        • patrolBoatHits

          int patrolBoatHits
          Current number of hits that player 1 has hit the cpu's patrol boat.

        • currentMode

          GameMode currentMode
          Current gameMode being played.

          int dragFromX
          X and Y coordinates used to line up the ship with the mouse when dragged.

        • dragFromY

          int dragFromY
          X and Y coordinates used to line up the ship with the mouse when dragged.

        • acCcanDrag

          boolean acCcanDrag
          Boolean to check if you can drag the aircraft carrier. Starts false because it is not clicked on yet.

        • bsCanDrag

          boolean bsCanDrag
          Boolean to check if you can drag the battle ship. Starts false because it is not clicked on yet.

        • cCanDrag

          boolean cCanDrag
          Boolean to check if you can drag the cruiser. Starts false because it is not clicked on yet.

        • sCanDrag

          boolean sCanDrag
          Boolean to check if you can drag the submarine. Starts false because it is not clicked on yet.

        • pbCanDrag

          boolean pbCanDrag
          Boolean to check if you can drag the patrol boat. Starts false because it is not clicked on yet.

        • boardSize

          int boardSize
          Sets board size to 10.
